TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebBaseErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 作为所有运行状况监视错误事件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all the health-monitoring error events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据, 以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是表示错误条件的运行状况监视事件的基类。The class is the base class for the health-monitoring events that represent error conditions. ASP.NET 使用及其派生类型在 Web 应用程序的生存期内指示错误条件。ASP.NET uses and its derived types to indicate error conditions during the lifetime of a Web application. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下, 你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型, 并且将通过在 "配置" `healthMonitoring`部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生, 以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例, 请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一种是配置文件的摘录, 使 ASP.NET 运行状况监视可以使用派生自类的事件。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET health monitoring to use an event derived from the class. 第二个示例演示如何从类派生, 以创建自定义事件。The second shows how to derive from the class to create the custom event. ``` ``` 下面的代码演示如何从类派生以创建自定义事件。The following code shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/CS/weberrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/VB/weberrorevent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 实现自己的继承自此类的事件类型时, 可以调用此构造函数。You can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从`SampleWebBaseErrorEvent`类 (派生自类的类) 的构造函数中调用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to call this constructor from a constructor for the `SampleWebBaseErrorEvent` class, a class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent/CS/webbaseerrorevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent/VB/webbaseerrorevent.vb#2)]

summary.span: 递增与性能相关的事件-错误计数器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会递增以下性能计数器:This method increments the following performance counters: - 引发了基础结构错误事件。Infrastructure Error Events Raised. 这是一个用于跟踪引发的错误事件的全局计数器。This is a global counter that tracks the error events raised. - 引发了错误事件。Error Events Raised. 这是特定于应用程序的计数器, 用于跟踪自应用程序启动以来引发的错误事件数。This is an application-specific counter that tracks the number of error events raised since the application started. 此方法还会调用父级, 这会递增引发的事件计数器。This method also calls the parent , which increments the Events Raised counter. 此计数器跟踪引发的事件总数。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中查看这些性能计数器, 请在 "**添加计数器**" 窗口中的 "**性能" 对象**下拉列表中选择 " **ASP.NET** ", 选择要查看的性能计数器, 然后单击 "**添加**" 按钮。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息, 请参阅 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档中的将[系统监视器 (PerfMon) 与 ASP.NET 应用程序配合使用](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409)。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
